name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Nightmare Troubadour [NDS]
description:
Yu-Gi-Oh! Nightmare Troubadour brings a new round of dueling action to
the Nintendo DS™. Utilizing the unique features of the Nintendo DS™,
players will experience the world of Yu-Gi-Oh! on two screens with touch
pad controls. Watch monsters rise up from their cards and battle it out
on the top screen with amazing 3D graphics. Use the bottom screen
strategically as it presents the card playing field in 2D and supports
full touch control. Duel against your friends or trade cards using the
wireless function.
